text: Korea Labour Institute (Korean: 한국노동연구원), or shortly KLI, is an governmental organisation that focuses about labour issues and policies. The organisation was inaugurated in 25 August 1988, and since 2014, it is located in Sejong City. The incumbent President is Bae Kyu-shik. == References == == External link == * Official website Category:Government of South Korea
title: Korea Labour Institute
